actions.caption: Upgrade the application to .NET 10 (LTS)
actions.description: Upgrade the application to .NET 10 (LTS)

displayName: Extended support for .NET 9 (STS) is ending
label: Extended support for .NET 9 (STS) is ending
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type contains 'microsoft.web/sites' and ['kind'] !contains 'functionapp' | extend Version=properties.siteProperties.properties | mv-expand Version | extend VersionName=tostring(Version.name), Versionvalue=tostring(Version.value) | where VersionName=='LinuxFxVersion' | where Versionvalue in ('DOTNETCORE|9.0') | project subscriptionId, id

actions.caption: Migrate to TLS 1.2 or later
actions.description: Migrate to TLS 1.2 or later

detailedDescription: The platform requires all connections to Microsoft Entra Domain Services to be secured using TLS 1.2 or later. To avoid potential service disruptions, update resources that use TLS 1.0 or TLS 1.1.
displayName: TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1 and blocked for Microsoft Entra Domain Services to enhance security
label: TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1 and blocked for Microsoft Entra Domain Services to enhance security
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type == 'microsoft.aad/domainservices' | where properties.domainSecuritySettings.tlsV1 == 'Enabled' | project subscriptionId, id

displayName: Azure Virtual Machines DCsv2-series are retiring
label: Azure Virtual Machines DCsv2-series are retiring
recommendationDataSourceQuery: resources | where type startswith 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines' | where properties['hardwareProfile']['vmSize'] startswith 'Standard_DC' and properties['hardwareProfile']['vmSize'] endswith '_v2' | project subscriptionId, id

recommendationDataSourceQuery:
